alert_headers.header_text: The arrival times of some Fitchburg Line trains have been adjusted by 5-10 minutes to reflect the actual performance of these trains under the new schedules.
Please board all trains on the inbound platforms at Haverhill & Bradford stations until further notice.
Fitchburg Line notice: The entrance to the Commuter Rail at Porter Station is closed for repair. Please utilize the subway entrance to access the Commuter Rail.
Pedestrian access to North Station will be through Legends Way beginning Saturday, October 22, through February 2017, due to the Hub on Causeway Project
Please board all Newburyport/Rockport Line trains on the inbound platform at Beverly.
Please board all Lowell Line trains on the inbound platform at North Billerica.
